channel.title: Weird extrania error when i login
channel.description: when i try logging into extrania this happens...then kicks me off and i try logging in again and my guy is invisible

item.title: Weird extrania error when i login
item.dc:creator: @Nice_Boots Nice Boots
item.description:
@Nice_Boots wrote:

[quote=“CPUsquad, post:4, topic:453162”][quote author=Nice Boots link=topic=556012.msg4070483#msg4070483 date=1344295191]
okay but disable what thought i searched up “sql” what do i delete/disable? i got TV btw
[/quote]

(facepalm) … look thru the files with SQL in them… look at the login method… The server is trying to connct to an sql db from where u downloaded the source… check the files to where the db’s connnecting or put // to disable the connections where the server is connecting[/quote]

okay i just did that and i erased all that login info stuff and its still not working you got TV so you can help me better?

Read full topic
item.source: Weird extrania error when i login

item.title: Weird extrania error when i login
item.dc:creator: @CPUsquad CPUsquad
item.description:
@CPUsquad wrote:

Nice Boots:

okay but disable what thought i searched up “sql” what do i delete/disable? i got TV btw

(facepalm) … look thru the files with SQL in them… look at the login method… The server is trying to connct to an sql db from where u downloaded the source… check the files to where the db’s connnecting or put // to disable the connections where the server is connecting
